name: Grow Ghost
description:
Made by lonelyfloat & mycodeisonfire for the Spooktober Game Jam.

Grow Ghost is a high score game where you can change the size of your character, at the cost of speed or manueverability.

CONTROLS - 

LEFT CLICK + DRAG to move your spirit

Q to grow and slow down your spirit

E to shrink and speed up your spirit
